solution_line_template: The shirts she bought cost her ${cost_of_bought_shirts} because {shirts_bought_count} x {cost_per_bought_shirt} = <<{shirts_bought_count}*{cost_per_bought_shirt}={cost_of_bought_shirts}>>{cost_of_bought_shirts}
She earned ${total_money_earned} selling her clothes because {cost_of_bought_shirts} + {money_left_store} = <<{cost_of_bought_shirts}+{money_left_store}={total_money_earned}>>{total_money_earned}
She made ${money_from_pants} off pants because {pants_sold_count} x {price_per_pant} = <<{pants_sold_count}*{price_per_pant}={money_from_pants}>>{money_from_pants}
She made {money_from_shorts} dollars from shorts because {price_per_short} x {shorts_sold_count} = <<{price_per_short}*{shorts_sold_count}={money_from_shorts}>>{money_from_shorts}
